mapper.insert: insert into t_rental( user_id, house_id, start_date, end_date, total_price, status, remark, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{userId}, #{houseId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{remark}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rental WHERE house_id = #{houseId} AND status IN ('pending', 'ongoing') ORDER BY created_at DESC
